name: A Grind Named Life 磨你人生
name_original: A Grind Named Life 磨你人生
description:
Use mouse to click options that controls your life, play with it, balance it, enjoy it, destroy it, give it up, rip it apart, and finally, deal with it.

Designed and developed by Suyi Diao and Rachel Li.

Music by Siyi Chen.

A game made in CiGA Game Jam 2020
